column5: Tejas Trails is part of the beautiful Casa Tejas property located in Wimberley, Texas, the heart of the Texas Hill Country, and is conveniently located one mile north of town off of Ranch Road 12 . Decorated in western décor, the cozy trailer offers charm, serenity, and tranquility. Nestled in the back of the Casa Tejas property, this ideal space can provide a secluded, peaceful setting for business travelers, couples, solo adventurers, or a fun “glamping” getaway.
column8: Tejas Trails - Happy Trails To You
